faq.q1: How far is it from the ticket counter to the viewing area (parking/summit)?
faq.a1: It’s approximately 3 km from the ticket counter to the parking area, and then around 15–20 minutes on foot from the parking area to the summit.
faq.q2: What is the weather like at the summit?
faq.a2: The summit weather is unpredictable and can change rapidly. Fog and sudden visibility changes are common.
faq.q3: How much is the entrance fee?

a3.before: Entrance fees vary based on visitor category (domestic, international, working days/holidays). For full details, tap
a3.after: to view the ticket price section.

faq.a4: No official guides are available, but the route is simple and easy to follow.
faq.a5: Yes. Food vendors are available near the upper parking area, offering snacks, meals, and drinks.
faq.q6: Are there stalls or shops at the top area?
faq.a6: There are small stalls near the parking area selling snacks, drinks, and souvenirs.
faq.a7: Opening hours generally start in the early morning until late afternoon from 5:00 AM to 4:00 PM
faq.a8: Yes, parking is available and located before the summit area. Visitors must continue on foot from the parking area to reach the top.
